repos.name: Name
repos.cloneCredGenerated: Your token has been generated. Please make sure to copy and store your token somewhere safe, you won't be able to see it again.
repos.RequireLatestCommitDescription: Require re-approval when there are new changes in the pull request
repos.RequireNoChangeRequestDescription: All change requests on a pull request must be resolved before it can be merged
repos.RequireCommentResolutionDescription: All comments on a pull request must be resolved before it can be merged
repos.RequireStatusChecksDescription: Selected status checks must pass before a pull request can be merged
repos.LimitMergeStrategiesDescription: Limit which merge strategies are available to merge a pull request
repos.AutoDeleteBranchDescription: Automatically delete the source branch of a pull request after it is merged
repos.BlockBranchCreationDescription: Only allow users with bypass permission to create matching branches
repos.BlockBranchDeletionDescription: Only allow users with bypass permission to delete matching branches
repos.RequirePullRequestDescription: Do not allow any changes to matching branches without a pull request
repos.RequireCodeReview: Require a minimum number of reviewers
repos.RequireCodeReviewDescription: Require approval on pull requests from a minimum number of reviewers
repos.enableRuleDescription: By enabling the toggle, the branch rule will be enforced.
repos.ruleDescriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description of this rule...
repos.applyRuleDefaultBranch: Apply this rule to the default branch
repos.editPermissionsCheckboxDescription: Allow users with edit permission on the repository to bypass
repos.deleteRepoDescription: This will permanently delete this repository, and everything contained in it.
repos.repoDescriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description of this repository...
repos.publicDescription: Anyone with access to the gitness environment can clone this repo.
repos.privateDescription: You can choose who can see and commit to this repository.
repos.noRulesDescription: There are no rules in this repository yet.
repos.settingsToolTip: Cannot change settings while loading or updating.
repos.secretScanningDescription: Block commits containing secrets like passwords, API keys and tokens.
repos.generateCredential: Please generate a clone credential if its your first time.
repos.toggleDescription: We will deliver event details when this hook is triggered
repos.desciptionPlaceholder: Enter a description of this rule...
repos.evenTriggerLabel: Which events would you like to use to trigger this webhook?

createProject.description: Organize your repositories, pipelines and more.

landingPage.selectProject: Select a project to get started
landingPage.description: Projects contain your repositories and pipelines. To start using Gitness, select a project or create a new one.

noData.checkSpelling: Check your spelling and filter options,
noData.changeSearch: or search for a different keyword.
noData.inviteMembers: Add your first team members by inviting them to join this project.
noData.noPullRequests: There are no pull requests in this project yet.
noData.createBranchDescription: Your branches will appear here once they're created.
noData.startBranchDescription: Start branching to see your work organized.
noData.noCommitsHistoryDescription: There isn't any commit history to show here for the selected user, time range, or current page.
noData.noCommitsYetDescription: Your commits will appear here once they're made. Start committing to see your changes reflected.
noData.noReposProject: There are no repositories in this project yet.
noData.createOrImportRepos: Create new or import an existing repository.

profileSettings.name: Name
profileSettings.noDataKeysDescription: There are no SSH keys associated with this account.
profileSettings.noTokenDescription: There are no personal access tokens associated with this account.
profileSettings.tokenSuccessDescription: Your token has been generated. Please make sure to copy and store your token somewhere safe, you won’t beable to see it again.
profileSettings.passwordSettingsDesc: Minimum of 6 characters long containing at least one number and a mixture of uppercase and lowercase letters.
profileSettings.addTokenDescription: Personal access tokens allow you to authenticate with the API.
profileSettings.addSshKeyDescription: SSH keys allow you to establish a secure connection to your code repository.
